gw.api.policy

Class PolicyTabUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.policy.PolicyTabUtil

  • public class PolicyTabUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility to access information about the tabs which should be visible for a given Policy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Set getTabSet(Claim claim)
      Gets the PolicyTab objects available for the Policy on the given Claim.
      static java.util.Set getTabSet(Policy policy)
      Gets the PolicyTab objects available for the Policy.
      static boolean hasTab(Claim claim, java.lang.String tabCode)
      Returns boolean indicating whether or not the tab represented by the given code should appear for the given claim.
      static java.lang.Boolean isTabAvailable(Claim claim, PolicyTab tab)
      Returns Boolean indicating whether or not PolicyTab "tab" should appear for the given claim.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getTabSet

        public static java.util.Set getTabSet(Claim claim)
        Gets the PolicyTab objects available for the Policy on the given Claim.
        Parameters:
        claim - the Claim whose Policy to use to determine the tabs.
        Returns:
        a Set of PolicyTab objects representing the tabs available for the given Claim's Policy.

      • getTabSet

        public static java.util.Set getTabSet(Policy policy)
        Gets the PolicyTab objects available for the Policy.
        Parameters:
        policy - the Policy to use to determine the tabs.
        Returns:
        a Set of PolicyTab objects representing the tabs available for the given Claim's Policy.

      • hasTab

        public static boolean hasTab(Claim claim,
                             java.lang.String tabCode)
        Returns boolean indicating whether or not the tab represented by the given code should appear for the given claim.
        Parameters:
        claim - the Claim whose Policy to check.
        tabCode - the code of the tab to check against the Policy's tabs.
        Returns:
        true if the Policy has the tab.

      • isTabAvailable

        public static java.lang.Boolean isTabAvailable(Claim claim,
                                               PolicyTab tab)
        Returns Boolean indicating whether or not PolicyTab "tab" should appear for the given claim.
        Parameters:
        claim - the Claim whose Policy to check.
        tab - the tab to check against the Policy's tabs.
        Returns:
        Boolean.True if the Policy has the tab.
